Returns a non-negative random integer that is less than the specified maximum @param MaxValue The exclusive upper bound of the random number to be generated. maxValue must be greater than or equal to 0 and less than or equal to @return A 32-bit signed integer that is greater than or equal to 0, and less than maxValue; that is, the range of return values includes 0 but not maxValue
